blockchainDescription:
DogWalkerToken (DWT) is a platform that goes beyond classic models of service applications.

Our mission is to create an ecosystem in which trust does not require intermediaries, and every transaction, assessment or interaction in the application is transparent, automatic and resistant to manipulation.

Traditional centralized applications are dependent on the operatorâ€™s decisions, a closed database and infrastructure limitations. Blockchain eliminates these barriers, giving users:

  • full control over data and reputation
  • security of funds
  • fair, non-editable terms of cooperation
bscHeading: Why did we choose Binance Smart Chain (BSC)?
bscDescription: Binance Smart Chain (BSC) is one of the most mature and popular Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) blockchain networks, making it an ideal choice for mass adoption applications like DogWalkerToken.
